name: WarHorse [Abridged]
description:
Play as Kyle, a horse from Horse World, as his world suddenly comes under attack by an alien invasion.  Gathering allies, and collecting weapons, from other Zones in Horse World, will he be able to push back the invasion?

This [Abridged] version is for the Indie Game Maker Contest 2018.  Hopes are to continue building on it, and eventually releasing it on mobile devices.
